project_plan.name: Weather Fetcher CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Create a user interface to input the city name and display the weather information
Write tests for the API integration and data parsing functionality
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure correctness
